product_name: SportHill Day Pass II Jacket - Men's - 2012 Overstock
long_description: The warm, fleece-lined SportHill Day Pass II men's jacket is designed to keep you comfortable during high-performance winter activities such as running, Nordic skiing and snowshoeing. Windshield soft-shell fabric is fleece lined for maximum warmth and comfort, and a Durable Water Repellent finish sheds light moisture. Front zipper features a full-length storm flap to keep the wind out. Adjustable hood opening with drawcord offers a personalized fit. Vertical back mesh vents feature zippered closures-let the heat out when your activity level rises. Warm fabric in cuffs extends and help keep hands warm; reflective logos at right front and left sleeve. The SportHill Day Pass II jacket features an invisible zippered rear pocket, and 2 zippered front pockets. Closeout.
short_description: The warm, fleece-lined SportHill Day Pass II men's jacket is designed to keep you comfortable during high-performance winter activities such as running, Nordic skiing and snowshoeing.
